fields.name: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
fields.description: A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Pullover Hoodie combines classic style with the soft comfort of fleece.

fields.name: Nike Dri-FIT Standard Issue
fields.description: This sweat-wicking combines a classic look with the feel of modern performance for beyond the basketball court. It's soft, yet heavyweight, with coverage that's ready to go right out of your gym bag.

fields.name: Nike Air Max 90 SE
fields.description: Step into the history books. Paying homage to Frank Rudy, the man who created the coveted cornerstone of cushioning—Air—these sneakers celebrate his legacy with fun details. From the release year proudly stamped on the Air unit to the see through "Air pocket" heel logo, striking visuals deliver a lesson in comfort.

fields.name: Air Jordan 1 Mid
fields.description: Inspired by the original AJ1, this mid-top edition maintains the iconic look you love while choice colors and crisp leather give it a distinct identity.

fields.name: Nike (M)
fields.description: Families come in all forms. No matter what your family looks like, this backpack has everything you need to take care of them. Meet the Nike (M) Diaper Bag, a 2-mode backpack and shoulder bag designed for modern parents on the go. Need a ton of organizational pockets inside for storage? Check. How about an easy-to-clean surface inside? It's got that too. There's even an insulated pouch for snacks or bottles. This bag has a parent's needs in mind, making your family outings less stressful and your adventures more enjoyable.
